resources.string: A little bit, how to use it.\n\nFirst, a list of tweets will appear in the middle, of course you can scroll up and down!
You can move the tabs to slide from side to side!
It is convenient to use by switching the various tabs!
New tweet from this button at the bottom left.
Menu from this button at the bottom right.
Tab list appears when you slide to the right edge of the screen!
\n\nSo, please take advantage of the TwitPane!
Slide vertically to rearrange the tabs
An error occurred while saving the search keyword. Please check there is a possibility that the number of count has reached the upper limit.
The maximum number of saved searches has been reached. Please delete other search items before saving.
Saved. You can see the saved keywords from search button from toolbar.
Are you sure you want to make tab of this keyword?
Are you sure you want to import this design?(restart TwitPane after imported)
Are you sure you want to delete this account?

An error occurred during the login process via the official Twitter application. 

(%1$s)

Log in via browser.
It seems that you do not have channel privileges. Please "Reauthorize Account" from the sub-menu of the account list to add channel permissions.
It seems that you do not have channel privileges. Would you like to re-authorize your account? (Current tab edits will be saved)
"Are you sure you want to remove %1$s from home?"
Failed..., please try again after a few minutes.
Running, please try again after a few minutes.
Cannot view the timeline of private account...
Cannot view the tweet of private account...
You have been blocked from retweeting this user\'s tweets at their request.
Are you sure you want to block?
Are you sure you want to block?
Are you sure you want to report spam this user?
Are you sure you want to destroy blocking?
You cannot dm, cause not followed from the user
Retweets from \@%1$s will no longer appear in your timeline
Retweets from \@%1$s will appear in your timeline
Failed. It may cannot communicate with twitter server. Please try again after a few minutes.
Failed. It may be deleted the resource(tweet or dm or other resource)
Rate limit exceeded(Twitter API Request Limit)\n\nPlease try again after approx %1$dmin.%2$dsec.
We are temporarily restricting the use of the API to avoid application outages from Twitter.
We are temporarily restricting the use of the API to avoid application outages from Twitter. \nWe apologize for the inconvenience, but please wait for a while until the restriction is lifted.
This list does not include Twitter API v2 rate limits.
Over account count limit: you can get limit to 5 if you subscribed
Failed to load image, try again after a few minutes...
Cannot launch the official Twitter app.\nPlease make sure that installed the latest official Twitter app.
Please enter description text in 140 characters or less
Select a list to add the member
Cannot add list member, because not following. Follow this user ?
Saved, and affects in a few minutes
Removed, and affects in a few minutes
How about TwitPane?\nCan you support out development on Google Play?
Voting and some actions are restricted by twitter, so show the tweet by official app of twitter alternatively. \n\nInstall official app?
Are you sure you want to enter debug mode?

Sorry for the inconvenience. 
 
There is a possibility that you are no longer available due to specification changes of Twitter. 
 
Please check for updates in the Google Play Store because there is a possibility that a modified version has been published already. 
(Please wait for a while now to the public if it is not published.) 
 
In addition, it is possible to cooperate to fix in a future version by sending to the author debug log. 
However, please note it may contain personal information in the log. 
If you want to send the debug log, select "Gmail" on the next screen.
Are you sure to restore default tabs. OK?
Are you sure you want to delete tab "%1$s" ?
Show Local TL of Any Instance
The host does not seem to be an instance of Mastodon
Thanks for using this App!\n\nIf you wish to hide ads, you can tweet the ad-tweet of this app. (Approx. %1$d days)
Already hided ads..\nAre you sure to restore ads. OK?
Sent the campaign tweet. so ads will hide about %1$ddays!
The number of times you have performed ad removal by PR Tweet has exceeded the limit. Please consider an ad cancellation pack (subscription) or paid version.

Open the Like page of the official app. 

Please note the account error as it will be executed with the account already logged in on the official app.

*The "Remember" button will immediately open the official application without displaying this screen for about one day from the next time.

Open the Retweet page of the official app. 

Please note the account error as it will be executed with the account already logged in on the official app.

*The "Remember" button will immediately open the official application without displaying this screen for about one day from the next time.
Cancel all labels of users included in this list(%1$susers), OK?
Set all labels of users included in this list(%1$susers) to \"%2$s\", OK? \n\nNote: keep users\' labels that already set labels
Set all color labels done.(user count:%1$s)
- Tap this button on the main screen to set the jump destination tab. \n- Press and hold the button to change the jump destination.
Could not find the toot to be handled from the main account instance
Do you really want to mark this tweet as spam?
There\'s a new version of this Tweet.
DM cannot be retrieved in this version
View the progress of this poll.
Remembered(You can call it in new tweet window)
Do you want local only?\nIf you choose local only, your posts will not be private. In most cases, you do not need to go "local only".
Editing posts with attachments may possibly degrade attachments.
Not supported to edit posts with polls.
Reload list of following users and followers, OK?
Are you sure you want to close?
Select the item you wish to delete
Are you sure you want to remove the following hashtag?
Please install Lossless Video Cutter on Store
Please enter in %1$d characters or less text
Over 140 characters. Do you want to post via TwitLonger?
Emoji may not appear as shown in this preview in some instances
Do you want to convert it into a quoted tweet ?
Cannot get photo. Please choose it again.
No mushroom app. \n\nPlease download mushroom app from Google Play Store.
Do you really want to open this page with browser?
Long tap text to start selection
Do you really want to exit?
Font size, thumbnail size, icon, pinned tweet and tweet design
Title bar, tab, side menu, etc.
Show thumbnail icon of replying user

Portrait style
New Twitter Official App style

Landscape style
Old Twitter Official App style
Thumbnail size when single photo attached
Thumbnail size when multi photos attached
Show account screen name (@name) on title
Show unread count on the right of title
Hide title-bar on the top automatically
Notification of Likes and RTs with icons
Enable fast scrolling box on list
Show API rate limit on title
Enable the pull-to-refresh feature of the list [default:ON]
Specify the distance to pull to refresh[default:32dp]
Show follow and follower count on timeline
Show link image and title from link url in the tweet [default:ON]
Animates the timeline emoji. If scrolling is slow, it is recommended to turn it off. [default:ON]
The number of emoji reactions to be displayed on the timeline. If this number is exceeded, the "More" button will be displayed. Misskey or Mastodon(Fedibird, kmy.blue)
Tap button to change function. \nLong tap button to change color of button.
By using cloud translation including DeepL and Google Translation service, the translation results will be higher quality and more accurate. Use a paid external services.
(can\'t use this service because my subscription has already been cancelled.)
Show local translation result after cloud translation one
Perform tweets, etc. via official apps
Like, RT, and Tweets are posted via the official Twitter application. [Default:ON]
Number of tweets to be retrieved per one access
Use v2 API for Home Timeline
Use Twitter API v2 to get the home timeline [default: OFF]

✔ API limit will be increased from 15 times per 15 minutes to 180 times per 15 minutes.
 ✔ The maximum number of tweets that can be retrieved at one time will be 100. 
 ✔ If the app becomes unstable, please turn the setting back off. 
 
 Do you want to enable it?
at the startup of app, the new timeline will loaded automatically when the cursor is top of timeline
Get next page when the scrolling position is bottom of the list
Set scroll position after acquired the mid-gap-tweets
Set scroll position after acquired the new tweets
Open link when tap the URL [default: ON]
Open link with internal browser(Chrome Custom Tabs)
Open YouTube link with internal browser(Chrome Custom Tabs)
Call function directly when tap left area of timeline
Call function directly when tap right area of timeline
Call function directly when long-tap left area of timeline
Call function directly when long-tap right area of timeline
Show the new message from the bottom
Show confirm dialog before sending tweet or message
Refresh timeline after sending tweet [default: OFF]
Remember hashtags in the last tweet
Show Emoji picker (mushroom: IME plug-in) button
Enable emoji-input feature of IME if supported
Show remain length of tweet on the title
Count tweet characters as a maximum of 280 characters
When you select an account and retweet or like it, even if the confirmation setting is ON, retweets and likes are executed immediately after selecting the account.
Are you sure you want to sort? (Cannot be reverted)
Cannot include comma in mute text
Start userstream automatically the startup of app[default:OFF]
Enable auto-scrolling at the top of the timeline. And disable it when scrolling down.
Show auto scroll button on TL
If you do not receive periodic notifications, please exclude this app from battery optimization.
Each tab will automatically get new tweets at the above notification interval. Change it by long-pressing the tab or from "Tab Settings".
Periodic notifications are turned off, so no automatic updates will be made.
Show soft keyboard when activated the search tab which not entered keyword
Show follow and follower count on search result
Open new window(activity) when showing search from trend[default:ON]
Choose ttf or otf file on the next dialog
Tweet save count for timeline tab [default:1000]
Tweet save count without timeline tab [default:1000]
[Misskey]Time to keep "From Continued" when getting new notes

In Misskey, new arrivals always start from the next page, so you will not be able to see the latest notes if you have not retrieved them in a while. Therefore, if a certain period of time has elapsed, the newest note will be retrieved instead of the next note.
Get the number of quoted tweets, polls, etc.
Automatically load the number of quoted tweets, replies, polls, etc. [default:ON]
Are you sure you want to remove all tab data?
Are you sure you want to import all settings from the exported-settings file? (WARNING!! ALL ACCOUNT SETTINGS WILL BE REMOVED!!)
\n\nZonePane does NOT support importing settings from MastoPane.
Are you sure you want to CLEAR all settings? (WARNING!! ALL ACCOUNT SETTINGS WILL BE REMOVED!!)
Fix twitter image problem on Wi-Fi (for Japanese au Hikari network)
You can remove ads with premium edition(TwitPane+)
Please subscribe ad-free pack on google play store to remove ads
You can remove ads by tweeting PR of TwitPane
You can remove ads by viewing video
Sorry, could not play video… Please try again after a few minutes.
Set dark theme running on Android 10 or later devices.
Are you sure you want to open location service setting?
Require LOCATION permission to run this function.\n\nPlease grant permission of location.
Require permission to get location of Trend.
Require STORAGE permission to run this function.\n\nPlease grant permission of storage.
Thank you for downloading %1$s!\nDo you wish to import settings from Free Edition?
You cannot migrate because the version of the Free Edition is too old.\nUpdate to the latest version?

You will need to re-authenticate for Twitter applications.
 
 Please authenticate again on the next screen. 
 
 If the account displayed in the next screen (browser) is different, please log out and log in again.
Add account without login(use current account on the browser), ok?
Additional authorization is required to view bookmarks

Twitter authentication failed.
note: If you are authenticating bookmarks, you may not be able to authenticate after logging in with another device. 

Please re-authenticate on the next screen.

The authenticated account did not match the current account.

 - Authenticated account: @%1$s
 - Current account: @%2$s
 
 Reauthenticate on the next screen.
Expiration date exceeded.\nIf a newer version is released, update or uninstall it.\nFor more information, please check our official account @TwitPane.
Do you wish to download EmojiPicker4T for TwitPane from %1$s?
You need the Google Translate app. Download from %1$s?
"We have exceeded the number of executions of today's inline translation, so we will translate with the Google Translate app"
We need the machine learning data (about 30MB) for the language to be translated. Are you sure you want to download it?

You can try Google Translation and DeepL Translations up to %1$d times per day.
 
 *If you want to use more than %2$d times, you need to purchase a subscription. Please check the translation settings.
 *The number of times is limited due to the use of a paid cloud service. Thanks for your understanding.
Mastodon consists of a variety of servers. Please select the server you wish to log in to. If you do not see your server in the list, please enter the URL directly.
Misskey consists of a variety of servers. Please select the server you wish to log in to. If you do not see your server in the list, please enter the URL directly.
failed to login. Do you want to login via browser?
Twitter is trademark of Twitter, Inc.
Please sign in after agreeing to Terms of Use, Privacy Policy.
The permission to access direct message was lost from Twitter. Are you sure you want to re-authorize?

The permission to access to Twitter was lost. Are you sure you want to re-authorize?\n\n*If this error appears repeatedly, there may be some kind of failure. Please check our official account (@TwitPane) and official website for the latest information.

A fatal authentication error has occurred. If this error is displayed repeatedly, there may be some kind of failure. Please check the official website and official account (@TwitPane) for the latest information.
Some settings will be applied after the application is restarted.

The quality of the translation can be improved by using Google\'s service called Cloud Translation.\n\nAs this cloud translation is a paid service, we ask you to subscribe to a subscription in order to continue developing and maintaining this application.
(Translation results will be more natural and high quality.)
(You can erase the banner ads at the top of the screen)
(You can erase the banner ads at the bottom of the screen)
(You can increase the number of accounts you can register by two.)
(You can increase the number of accounts you can register by 5)
(You can increase the number of accounts you can register by 5)
(You can increase the number of accounts you can register by 5)
(You can view quoted tweets of a tweet)
Only available to users with a subscriptions due to Twitter\'s Tweet cap, which is a strict limit on the number of tweets that can be retrieved.
You will be automatically charged %1$s per month until you cancel in the Google Play Store. Previous charges will not be refunded when you cancel unless it is legally required.
There is a limit to the number of times you can use Cloud Translation per day.
You can see the events that took place in the background, such as "Posts" and "New Notifications".

string-array.name: search_edition_introduction_message
string-array.item: This application is for Twitter search.
I am good at list tracking and searching.
Posting tweets, replying, messages... I don\'t know what you\'re talking about!
Are there users who don\'t show up in your search? Tweets from users with key accounts or shadow-banned users may not show up.
Maybe filter: doesn\'t work in the search. The results are different from the official app or the web version of Twitter.
Tap on the poll to launch the official app.
